scripts.clean: lerna exec -- rm -rf assets examples lib LICENSE README.md && lerna clean
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:jumpsuit/jumpsuit gh-pages --force
